dialog.text: 5 days to go before submission and I still haven't found those files :cold_sweat:  Looks like I am going to have to pull an all-nighter to rewrite some of them.  Are you almost there with yours?

joins.text: Sounds like you got a lot done.

dialog.text: I tried to push through although Mum was complaining as it was a lovely day and I was just sat at the computer all day.  Jeff was sending me messages all weekend - I think he's in a panic.  Have you heard from him?

He's been so calm all the way through, but he was panicking as I don't think he had been doing anything apart from the project work.   Anyway, we are almost at the finish line.  I still have a couple more reflections to do about my last project. Let's get this done!
